title: Found dirt & wax in ears after ghusl, ghusl valid? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: sua from the ukam Alum so my question is about um so I I don't know if I've cleaned my ear lops before I w't say I did but I'm doubtful but either way I did I'm try to put water and and put water inside my ear lobs and then after a I found like some dirt in my ear I touched it by mistake it was some there um that's um mixed with water and also when I was doing um after it was some time after like ours um I found ear wa while I was wiping my ear so it's my valid yes it is valid and you have to move on and not uh allow Shan to fill up your head with such OCD thoughts move on Islam is a religion of ease and simplicity
